123.content:
Chuck walked up the pea-gravel walkway to the step. Climbing the three short steps onto the front porch, he pushed the doorbell, hearing it buzz within.

The soon-to-be high school senior had been working for Orange Star Pizza as a delivery driver. Between tips, his hourly wage, and the fact that they paid him mileage for his gas, all added up to make the job pretty profitable. That said, he was still debating whether or not he would continue working once classes started back up. The money was good, but he knew he needed to up his GPA. And the smell in his car, especially in the Arizona heat, was something else entirely...

Any further thought on his future plans would have to wait as he heard the sounds of footsteps. He'd gotten to know this house and its chief occupant fairly well over the summer.

After all, he was here three times a week.

He didn't know much about her. He knew her name was Alice MacBeath, since it was on the receipt. Judging from her appearance, she was probably a fair bit younger then him, though Chuck would admit he was pretty poor at guessing such things. He'd never seen either her parents or any vehicles, though there were clear tread marks in the gravel driveway to indicate their passage. He felt pretty confident saying both that she was frequently left to her own devices and not much of a cook, given how often she ordered out.

And, as befitted someone who ordered pizza three times a week, she was a pretty big girl.

The sound of the heavy deadbolt and latches being unlocked acted as the drum roll before the door opened, revealing the extra-wide redhead. Chuck had seen her enough to not be shocked by her size, although it had certainly caught him off guard at first.

The first thing someone would notice was her sheer width. Her hips seemed almost impossibly wide, filling the entire entryway. Her gigantic thighs were as round as a barrel, possessed of their own flabby rolls which drooped heavily over her knees. Her calves were bigger around then Chuck's thighs, and despite her youth, she already had full blown cankles. Even her bare feet looked a little pudgy...

In spite of her ultra-pear build, her gut was no slouch in the size department, either. Her belly flab had divided into three large rolls, which stretched far to the sides and front. The lowest of the three was also the largest, the pale flesh hanging heavily out of her shirt and drooping over the front of her sweatpants. Her belly button was hidden in the deep crease created by her bottom and middle rolls, and even the top roll was bigger then the bumps on her chest.

Her swollen upper arms looked like large, pale chickens, and even as she opened the door, Chuck could see her jelly-like lard hanging from her arm, jiggling slightly. Her forearms, by contrast, had only rounded out slightly, only helping to emphasize how much larger her upper arms were.

Her face, meanwhile, had remained fairly small. Her cheeks had definitely rounded out, her neck was thick with fat, and she had the beginnings of a double chin, but for better or worse, it seemed Alice didn't have much of a fat face.

Chuck may not have been shocked by her size anymore, but watching how she swelled over the summer had been something else. Alice had already been pretty fat when he started delivering to this address, but she'd grown week to week until she was outright obese. Even her foot steps had grown slower and heavier as time passed. She was currently dressed in a pair of grey sweats and an Alice Cooper tank top, which he suspected was her main choice in clothing, given she always seemed to be wearing them.

Despite how big she'd originally been, the clothing had been somewhat loose on her back in June. Now, however, she filled them to capacity. Her belly pressed on all sides of her shirt, exposing every roll and leaving her lowest unable to be contained. Her swollen lower half was much worse, leaving her sweats seeming painted on. They were so tight that Chuck thought he could make out the cellulite on her massive hips...

Chuck smiled as he held out the credit machine. "That'll be $XX.xx."

Alice tapped the machine, which promptly dinged as it accepted payment. "Here you are," Chuck said as he pulled her order from his bag, "one large pepperoni, one large deluxe, one large ham and pineapple, an order of cinnastix with an extra icing dip, and a 2L of Mountain Dew."

Alice, as per her usual, refused to meet his eyes. She was blushing as she looked at her oversized order, and only got redder as he listed it off. One hand absentmindedly went to her flabby belly for a moment. She gave a shy "Thanks" as she took the order.

As she turned, she closed the door with her foot, giving Chuck a brief view of her backside. Her back rolls were clearly defined in her too-tight top, and her football sized love handles refused to be contained by the suffering cloth. However, those features paled in comparison to her gargantuan butt. It seemed for every pound she put on elsewhere, two went straight to her cheeks, leaving her with an ass that seemed like it massively outweighed the rest of her fattened form. Her rectangular cheeks stuck out behind her by a foot or more, and were as wide as her gargantuan hips.

As the door shut, Chuck was left with the view of her poor, skin tight sweat pants, stretched beyond reason over her impossibly huge derriere. Chuck let out a breath he didn't know he'd been holding in.

"Holy shit, she's gotten huge," he thought as he went to his car. "Well, eating 9 pizzas a week will do that. At least she tips well. You'd think her parents would have stopped this or something. At the rate she's going, she'll be a house before she gets to high school."

******

Alice closed and locked the door with a sigh. Setting the alarm, she picked up her massive haul of food and began the short walk to her bedroom, her tummy letting out a subdued growl en route. Her thick thighs and lardacious booty forced her to walk with a heavy waddle. Her flabby body jiggled with each plodding step, and she was noticeably breathing more heavily by the time she arrived at her desk.

Placing her food on the left of her monitor, she dropped into her chair with a loud "Oomph!" The suffering piece of furniture let out a loud and worrisome creak, but it held her up. "For now, at least..."

She felt the arms of the chair pinching her fattened flanks, a feeling which had only grown more pronounced as the summer went on. Alice sighed as she leaned forward to grab her cinnastix, hearing a loud pop from her rear. Her pants felt looser afterwards, and she felt back with her hand and confirmed it; she'd just burst her largest remaining sweat pants.

She felt her lip tremble a bit as she dipped her first stick into the frosting. Taking a big bite, she thought, "Not again! How much bigger can I get!?"

Alice had always been a bigger girl, but the past couple years had seen her weight really spiral out of control. It certainly didn't help that her parents were always working. Or having affairs, she wasn't sure which. Either way, they were barely home, and had developed a knack for making her feel like she was perpetually underfoot the few times they were. Her mom had given her a credit card to pay for her meals, and Alice had become pretty well known among the local delivery drivers, as her widely spreading belly and chair-crushing booty would attest to.

Making matters worse was her crippling shyness. Alice found making friends to be nearly impossible, and it only got harder as she became more self-conscious regarding her weight. The end result was that she was more or less a shut in, filling her time with gaming and relying on increasing amounts of fattening food for comfort. The ironic fact that she was comfort eating to shut out her burgeoning weight problem wasn't lost on her, but she just couldn't bring herself to stop.

The past month had seen her eating even more. The first day of 8th grade was coming up all too quickly. She'd been teased mercilessly for her weight before, and Alice was dreading her classmates' reaction to her considerable summer gains.

Her poor physical shape was also a cause for concern. She hadn't been physically active before, but she'd barely moved since the start of summer, generally only walking from her bed, to her desk, to the door, and back. Her butt alone probably outweighed her classmates, always felt like it was trying to pull her over the few times a day she walked, and left her pinned to whatever she was sitting on the rest of the time. Alongside her titanic thighs, even the thought of a long walk made her break out in a nervous sweat, so what would gym class be like?

She couldn't even stay hidden for her last free weekend, as her mom had made her an appointment to get her uniform resized at the mall tomorrow. The fact that her mom clearly recognized that her expansive daughter would need a bigger uniform but not care enough to help her rein in her appetite in really hurt.

And now, she'd popped her biggest pants, and as Alice felt her side, confirmed the seams of her shirt were also beginning to separate. Finishing her dessert at a breakneck pace, she grabbed a slice of pizza as she booted up her computer. She had a long night of eating and grinding soul stones ahead of her as she tried to ignore how much of her was hanging over the sides of the chair, or how her belly pushed into her desk as she leaned forward for another slice.
123.title: Alice! Who da *BLEEP* is Alice!?

1231.content:
"Syl! How's it going!?"

"Becky!" Sylvia Winters gave her BFF, Rebecca Andersen, a big hug. Normally quite pale, Becky currently had a dark tan which contrasted harshly with her natural blonde hair. "How was Hawaii?"

"OMG, it was amazing! I didn't want to come back, like, at all. Can you believe summer is almost over?"

"I know, right? Seems like it just flew by." Where Rebecca had spent her summer on a beach, Syl had spent hers helping out at her parents' bookstore. Being a huge nerd, and very much in love with her a/c, she didn't feel she'd missed anything spending her summer out of the Evil Sun. "So, you ready for class?"

Sylvia was teasing her friend a bit, as Becky was a little notorious for being a poor student. Outside of art and gym, she wasn't very academically inclined. "Ugh, no. Not even a little. It's actually why I'm here today. Got to pick the last of the stuff I need before Monday."

"Same here! I just need to pick up my uniform from Burt's. What all you got left?"

"Well..." Becky trailed off as she pulled the list from her pocket. And what a list! Multiple pages of stuff, from clothes to note books and more. Sylvia went wide eyed as she looked over the sheets Becky handed her.

"... you haven't gotten a thing for school yet, have you?"

"Not exactly, no."

Syl rubbed her forehead and sighed. "Geez, girl. Well, you might as well come with me to Burt's and get your uniform squared away. I'll help you get the rest of this monster sorted after."

"Thanx, Syl! You're the best!"

"Don't I know it. You owe me for this one. For real."

The two girls chatted about their respective summers as they walked through the busy shopping center. Becky had clearly enjoyed her vacation on the Big Island, as Sylvia found it hard to get a word in edgewise. All of a sudden, the Scandinavian descendant fell silent mid-sentence. Sylvia, initially hopeful she'd be given a chance to speak, saw the blonde girl staring wide eyed over her shoulder. Frowning, she turned around to see what had shocked her to stillness.

Sylvia's jaw dropped as she saw a whale of a girl sitting on a bench just outside Burt's. She looked to be their age, but holy Toledo, she was so fat! Her wide hips easily took up more then half the bench, and even this far away, Sylvia could see her butt protruding out the back of the seat and drooping under its own mass. Her large belly was spread across her lap and rose high up, apparently deciding she could only be so wide along the x axis before growing across the z.

Her pale skin was flushed almost as red as her crimson hair, and the young girl was clearly sweating. The threadbare clothes she was wearing looked fit to burst around her oversized features, and she was breathing heavily as she scarfed down a pair of jumbo sized chili cheese dogs. There was a whole slough of bags beside her, indicating that she'd done a fair bit of shopping today, and taking that with how tired she clearly was, she was obviously in pretty poor shape.

Sylvia just watched in shocked silence for a moment as she watched this jumbo sized tub of lard added even more calories to her unpretentious country wide ass. Her reverie was broken by Becky's voice quietly muttering, "Wait a second. I know that girl..."

She trailed off for a second, the gears slowly turning before she snapped her fingers. "Got it! It's Clifford!"

Sylvia frowned. "Who?"

Becky rolled her eyes. "You know, Clifford? The big, red dog? The fat, soulless ginger who doesn't talk. That's, oh God, what's her real name...?"

Sylvia suddenly interrupted. "Wait, you mean Alice?"

"Yes, that's it!"

"No way, it can't be. I mean, yeah, she was pretty big, but not like this!" Even as she said it, Sylvia looked over the object of their discussion. As she looked at her face, she slowly came to realize that this was, in fact, Alice. "OMG, that is her! Holy crap, she got huge!"

"I'll say," Becky giggled.

"How did she even get that big!?"

"Poor diet and lack of exercise, I'd say."

"... thanks, Becky. Never would've guessed."

"Still," Syl tried to redirect the conversation back to Alice. "That is a special kind of fat. Like, make the news level of fat. How is that even possible?"

******

Alice chewed her hot dogs while taking deep breaths through her nose. It had so far been an exhausting day, and her poor, underwhelming muscles were just not equipped for this level of work.

Her night had gone the way every night had for her all summer; with her steadily chewing as she traveled through the lands of Azeroth. She'd finished her cinnastix before she started gaming, and mindlessly ate slice after slice of pizza as she grinded for soul shards. Her main was a female human warlock on the Classic servers, which meant she frequently had to restock her supply of shards, which meant a lot of grinding, and a crippling fear of bag space.

This also left her other hand free to funnel a steady stream of pizza into her maw, and by the time she called it a night at 1 am, she'd managed to finish off the pepperoni pizza, and start on the ham and pineapple. Her belly felt packed to brim as she arranged her pillows for the night. Her butt cheeks were so large that she had her bed tilted up and several pillows piled behind her back, just to let her sleep well.

She woke up about 8:30 this morning. Her computer desk was right beside her bed, and so, without even having to get up, she ate another three slices of pizza and finished off the last half of her 2L of pop. After that, she waddled to the bathroom for a quick shower, then came back and plopped down on her poor, defenseless chair for more pizza and WOW. It was only as she finished off the second pizza that she remembered her appointment. Quickly getting dressed and rushing to the bus stop ("quickly" being relative, mind), she got to the mall just on time.

It was only after she arrived that she learned her mom had given her the wrong time, and that she was in fact an hour early. "Knowing mom, she did that intentionally 'cause she didn't trust me to be on time. Bitch."

Given she had a bit of time, and the fact that her sweats were being held together with duct tape, Alice did a bit of other shopping while waiting for her appointment. She now had a number of new pants and shirts, all of them very stretchy and without pesky buttons or sleeves to worry about. Heck, she'd even had time for lunch before her adjustment, which was good, as she was absolutely starving. Alice's overworked stomach was used to having consumed considerably more food by now. Under normal circumstances, she'd have been finishing off the third pizza by now, and ordering something through uber eats.

By comparison, two chili dogs were a pauper's meal, but beggar's can't be choosers, and she didn't really have time for a full meal right now.

As she took the last bite of her dogs, a large drop of chili fell onto her stained and straining shirt, and she promptly wiped it off with her finger. As she slurped the digit dry, she saw two very familiar figures coming towards her...

15313.content:
Madison's mother, Sylvia, paused for a moment as she passed through the living room. Madison was on the couch, talking excitedly on the phone to one of her friends. MTV blared from the television in front of her.
Sylvia did the same thing when she was a teenager, though it was Michael Jackson and New Kids On The Block, instead of Bruno Mars and Justin Bieber.
Would Madison go through what she had? Sylvia shuddered, and continued into the kitchen. She began dicing some tomatoes for that night's dinner as her mind drifted back to her teenage years again.
Sylvia had been quite attractive in her middle school years. Healthy Italian genetic stock had contributed towards her early development, compounded by a rather strict diet regime imposed by her mother.
What young girl wouldn't want that kind of figure? Sylvia had gotten the attention of many, many boys. Special treatment. Better grades.
But it took it's toll. Sylvia chopped the tomatoes harder as she remembered the self-loathing and the awful results of her bulimia. The catcalls. The harassment. The judgement. Being viewed not as a real human, but as virtual cattle, expected to find herself a good doctor, lawyer, maybe even a rising mobster, to marry and raise a family with.
No. She couldn't put Madison through that. There was still time to nudge her to a better self-image, to make her daughter see that there was more to life.
Sylvia looked down at the finely diced tomato, and got an idea. An elegant way to both put some meat on her daughter's bones, and let her enjoy rich foods. Maybe even put her onto cooking as a new career choice.
Sylvia had planned on making a vegetarian spaghetti. But she began mentally changing the recipe as she took out the frozen meatballs from the freezer, and the canned three-cheese spaghetti sauce.
This would be the first of many rich dinners for Madison.

15533.title: MORE!

choices: Go back to when it first started.
Go forward into the great, fat unknown.
155331.content:
It really was a bad idea, but there were no laws against it.

And so it was that High Hills Middle School became entirely surrounded by fast-food joints. Of all kinds too, from burgers to chicken to tacos to Chinese to pizza. None of it was particularly good for you either, much to the Health teacher's chagrin.

High Hills prided itself on its open campus policy, they'd put it into effect five years ago and so far there were no problems. That is, until now. And this was turning into a very BIG problem.

It wasn't just the girls fault, they were just eating cheap, delicious food that was easy to pick-up and bring back to the cafeteria for lunch. The effects on their bodies, however, were making the pick-up much harder to do.

Eating junk for breakfast and lunch over the past two weeks had left the girls of High Hills in rough, unfit shape. There was hardly any actual pants to be found, instead, sweatpants had come to dominate the halls. And for good reason too, most of the on average 15 pound gain had attacked the girls' midsections, drawing bellies out to rest just over the waistband of said sweatpants.

The overall activity of the school had also gone down, evident by the attendance of gym class. Most of the girls now opted to sit on the stairs in the school and drink soda while simultaneously stuffing their faces with the greasy food. The bathroom had become one of the most visited places in school, much to the janitors' joy, their jobs were at least secure.

If there was to be a spot of tragedy in the school, it was on the High Hills Cheer Team, which had all but given up cheerleading altogether. Afterschool sports in general had become little more than excuses to hang around and eat more fast-food.

But the Cheer Team had really taken this too heart.

Fourteen girls sat in a circle in the gym, surrounded by boxes of various origins, some from the same restaurant and some from different restaurants, depending on the girl. The coach had decided to just let the girls do their thing after the first week, she'd failed to even inspire any activity in the once active group. Now, they all sat around in their slowly shrinking sweatpants, talking about boys and the like. The captain, Tina, let out a rather uncouth fart before making her way to the bathroom for the fourth time that day. She was followed by four other girls.

Lucy groaned and reached for another Deluxe Burger. She could already feel the stewing of her intestines as they prepared her body for another twenty minutes on the toilet. She used to be the Class President, she still was, but her class hadn't done anything the past two weeks. So she stayed behind in the classroom to eat burgers and talk with her two best friends and co-officers, Holly and Majorie. The three of them had finished what little paperwork there was about fifteen minutes ago, but they had not finished their food, a problem they were quickly correcting.

The Editor-In-Chief of the school newspaper readjusted her pants, popping open her button to let her stomach breathe. Ashley was in complete denial, there was no way the most health-conscious girl in school had gained weight! Sadly, the 24 pounds of flesh gurgling and churning her Chinese after-school snack didn't agree. Chinese was healthy, right? The massive groan her tummy let out, followed by her new found need for a restroom, again did not agree with that.

High Hills Middle School was turning into breeding ground for unhealthy, overweight, and out-of-shape young adults.
155331.title: Fast-Food, Fast-Food Everywhere!

choices: The girls think about it, but return to their habits.

1553312.content:
It was science class and the majority of the girls were attempting to keep their guts from utterly destroying themselves. Lunch had ended just some twenty minutes ago, which was just enough time for the girls' tummies to quickly process the junk consumed during lunch period. Most of that junk was now begging to be released from the overloaded intestines of the poor girls.

Heather couldn't keep it in any longer. Just a little bit more, come on, don't be the only one. Unfortunately, Heather's stomach had put up enough with holding the massive amount of gas in.

*PPFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTTT*

Heather's bottom let out the most disgusting, Earth-shattering fart High Hills Middle School had ever kept on unofficial record. Somewhere far away from the blast zone, a Nuclear Physicist detected a replica of the Big Bang. Basically, Heather had just blown half of her class into sheer terror from the amount of gas passed through her bowels. And that led to the rest of the ailing girls in her class to let their winds break.

Within seconds, science class was host to what smelled like a toxic waste dump. None of the girls could smell it, considering the majority of their days were now spent in this fragrance, but the teacher had to call class early just to get away from the smell. He called in sick immediately afterwords.

This let the girls pull their post-lunch snacks out. Leftover chicken fingers, greasy cheeseburgers, chili dogs, and even some cleverly placed pizza slices came from the purses, bags, and backpacks of the girls. The last half of science class turned into a second lunch.

Now it should be obvious that the girls in science class, and indeed High Hills in general, we're complete train wrecks healthwise. This could be plainly seen in their figures. The Fifth Grade girls, who weren't fully developed yet, put most of the weight in their rotund tummies, which now were barely held back by a combination of sweatpants and either loose-fitting sweaters or long shirts. The Sixth Grade girls carried most of the weight in their bottoms and middles, more or less spread out evenly. The Seventh Grade girls had some of the weight go towards their bosom, filling out their chest, while simultaneously letting gravity take over and forcing their breasts down as they went out. The Eighth Grade girls were the most varied, with even parts spread between their bottoms, middles, and breasts.

Tina, a Seventh Grader, was proud to be cheer captain at such a young age, considering that Eighth Graders were normally de facto captains. She definitely was not putting her position to use, however, as she munched away on some fries; filled from enough calories and fat to feed a girl three times her size, which was filling out in almost every way. Her sweatpants said "Sweetie" across her butt, though now the distance between the "S" and "e" was stretched out more than Victoria's Secret would care to admit. Her loose tank-top let her substantial belly stick out as she sat leaning against the bleachers. Her stomach made low growls and gurgles as it digested the food, a signal to Tina that she would most likely be back in the restroom comet eh end of "practice". Her team was in marginally better shape, though three girls were MIA for the time being, most likely, they were picking up more food.

Lucy, a Sixth Grader, stretched her form out across the ultra-comfy chair she sat in. She went back to texting her best friend Majorie in Health Class (Which was pretty ironic anymore), telling her about last night's endeavors. They mostly revolved around eating food in her room while she caught up on her favorite Vines and finished up her homework. Lucy's room had become a huge mess in the past couple of weeks. Clothes lay haphazardly strewn across the floor. Her mother had given up cleaning her room after one week, and cooking actual meals for her daughter was ended in two. Now, Lucy's Mom just handed her a daily stipend and went back to her work.

Ashley, an Eighth Grader, had it the worst out of the three girls. Her Mom hounded her about fitness whenever she had the chance, so Ash had adopted the technique of waiting until her parent had gone to the Gym before she came home. Her bag was normally stuffed with food, as was her belly. She quickly escaped to her room and blogged whole she chewed through the rest of her meals. Her room permanently stank of gas and grease from her stomach and food respectively.

All three of the girls, and most of High Hills, had not showered in two days, the reasoning being that the food would just cover up their smell anyways. What few health-conscious girls remained kept to themselves, eating salads and using the now quite empty weight room. The rest either tied their slightly greasy hair in a ponytail or let it flow over their shoulders. Those with short hair didn't worry to much about that aspect,though the new bouts of acne they had started to develop was slightly worrying. Though food always helped distract them from their increasingly blemished face, as did food help the other girls deny their expanding waistlines.

It wasn't until Gina split her pants that even some of the girls grew self-aware of their predicament.
1553312.title: Classtime! (Four Days Later)

choices: A new superintendent comes to lead, and she is appalled!

15533121.content:
The Gina incident had occurred on a quiet Thursday afternoon. As the girls were trudging through the hallways to their next classes, Gina was just rounding a corner. She was dressed in striped capris that were pushed out by her bubble-behind. A stray calculator slid off of the top of Gina's math book, and so started the fatal event.

As Gina bent over, a loud RIP sounded from her back. A dark shade of red coated Gina's face, and a collection of her friends quickly ran to help her out. Unfortunately, the damage had already been done. A large tear in the middle of the capris let her plush rear end bulge out the required space, finally able to breathe. And naturally, being able to breathe meant that the gas Gina had been holding in till she reached her locker let itself out.

The whole situation was embarrassing, and some of the girls began to wonder why their own clothes didn't seem to fit as well.

"I'm telling you Jane, something is up. I've never had to get a new uniform, my body's been the same thing since fifth grade,really. Why is it just now that my shirts don't fit?" Martha, the speaker, pointed to her backside, highlighting a unique area of her figure that represented the greater whole. Martha's body was a shade of the former basketball player she used to be, now her belly was coated with fat, her butt jiggled with each step, and her thighs, pasty and flabby, came together when she stood or sat.

"It's nothing Martha, just keep quiet. We haven't had to practice in, like, forever." Jane sat on the bench in the locker room, stuffing her face with the third burger from her food-run. Her figure was in worse shape than Martha's, it looked like someone had injected lard into the body of a once slim, petite girl. The height of Jane didn't help matters, her body resembled a peach thanks to it.

"Yeah, that is nice..."

The next week progressed in much the same way as before, with the collection of girls in school slowly outgrowing their clothes. The nurse had to provide spare sweatshirts on a daily basis, as most girls ripped theirs by the end of the day. The activity level of the school had dropped dramatically, with gym class consisting of the bare, bare minimum to pass.

The girls also had started walking slower, taking their time in between classes and bathroom breaks. As bellies grew and bottoms widened, so did the food bags brought to-go from the deluge of fast-food joints around the school. By the end of the week, the average weight had increase from 120 to 145, and the profits still kept increasing just as the girl's lifestyles became consumed by consumption.

Like the voracious girls she had becoming indefinitely hungry. All attempts to quell the hunger were in vain and only fattened her up. Now she sat munching on chips at a meeting, laden in lard.
